name: Extra Team Widget
author: Extra Addons

sections.description:
Extra Team Widget is an elementor add-on to showcase your Team Widget style/design. This is an simple and flexible way to add new elements/widgets to Elementor Page Builder.

Note: This plugin is a widget of Elementor Page Builder and will only work with Elementor Page Builder installed.

Features

ðŸ‘‰ Social Media Field
ðŸ‘‰ and More…
sections.faq:
Can I use the plugin without Elementor Page Builder?

No. You cannot use without Elementor since itâ€™s an addon for Elementor.

Does it work with any theme?

Absolutely! It will work with any theme where Elementor works.

Is there any shortcode to use it in a page or post ?

No.
